elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is meant by "paraphrase" in the context of text summaries?
elements.correctAnswer: Summarizing texts in your own words.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What do you call verbatim reproductions of statements?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What should I look out for in the title of a summary?
elements.correctAnswer: Use neutral wording, avoid judgmental words.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What is the appropriate writing style for a summary?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: How can important content be visually distinguished from details?
elements.correctAnswer: By highlighting important passages in color and crossing out less important passages.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: How can you check whether the summary contains all the important information?
elements.correctAnswer: By checking with the W questions.
